lines.english: Oh it's been ages, since we made the front pages
lines.irish: Ó, is fada ó bhíomar ar na príomhleathanaigh

lines.english: Sin deireadh linn ar hiatus
lines.irish: That’s us done with hiatus

lines.english: Back to annoy 'em cunts that hate us
lines.irish: Ar ais chun cur isteach ar na bastards a fuathann muid

lines.english: It's back to basics, a scumbag hood I'm shameless
lines.irish: Ar ais go bunúsach, scumbag hood, níl náire orm

lines.english: Take more than that to tame us
lines.irish: Tógfaidh sé níos mó ná sin chun muid a smachtú

lines.english: All your fault cause you made us famous
lines.irish: Is ortsa an locht – rinne tú muid cáiliúil

lines.english: All your fault cause you made us famous
lines.irish: Is ortsa an locht – rinne tú muid cáiliúil

lines.english: Sticking our face in your papers
lines.irish: Á chur ár n-aghaidheanna sna nuachtáin

lines.english: But we got love by our neighbours
lines.irish: Ach faigheann muid grá ónár gcomharsana

lines.english: You keep track when you're giving favours
lines.irish: Coinníonn tú súil ar gach fabhar a thugann tú

lines.english: Sad
lines.irish: Brónach

lines.english: Cuir i gcéill go bhfuil tú deas
lines.irish: Pretend you’re nice

lines.english: I do shuigh i do phálás
lines.irish: Sitting in your palace

lines.irish: We all see through your flattery

lines.english: Achan uile rud ar son do leas

lines.english: Níos mó votaí sin do thasc
lines.irish: More votes for your task

lines.english: Ag ceangail rudaí nach bhfuil nasc... Ann.
lines.irish: Tying things together with no link at all

lines.english: Call [?] your face and then you're scum
lines.irish: Lipeáil ortsa agus ansin is bruscair thú

lines.english: That's enough for the story that'll run
lines.irish: Sin go leor don scéal a fhoilseofar

lines.english: Sensational headline, that's job done
lines.irish: Ceannteideal scannalach, obair déanta

lines.english: Fuck me it's been ages, since my mickey was contagious
lines.irish: Ó mo Dhia, is fada ó bhí mo mickey tógálach

lines.english: So you thought the Kneecap craze was over, we're back
lines.irish: Cheap tú go raibh Kneecap críochnaithe, táimid ar ais

lines.english: Keeping diabetic politicians raging
lines.irish: Ag cur polaiteoirí le diaibéiteas trína chéile

lines.english: Been a while since cunts were blaming
lines.irish: Tá sé tamall ó bhí bastards ag cur an mhilleáin

lines.english: Kneecap, no ranting no raving
lines.irish: Kneecap, gan scairteadh ná béicíl

lines.english: It's been no naming or shaming
lines.irish: Gan ainmniú ná náiriú

lines.english: Táimid ar ais, your career we're saving
lines.irish: Táimid ar ais, táimid ag sábháil do ghairm bheatha

lines.english: Naomi Long, do you need another epidural?
lines.irish: Naomi Long, an bhfuil eipidéarach eile uait?

lines.english: All cause we unveiled a mural
lines.irish: Go léir mar d’oscail muid murla

lines.english: Ach Mo Chara, why so cruel?
lines.irish: But Mo Chara, cén fáth an chruálacht?

lines.english: Cause it's been ages, God bless us and save us
lines.irish: Mar is fada uainn, Dia linn agus sabhála muid

lines.english: Back with a bang and it feels amazing
lines.irish: Ar ais le fuinneamh agus tá sé uafásach maith

lines.english: Going nowhere or going places
lines.irish: Ag fanacht anseo nó ag dul i bhfad

lines.english: New centerpiece Telegraph

lines.english: Did you miss us, are you glad?

lines.irish: That we’re back with a plan
